election_record.label: Virginia 1803 House of Delegates, Rockbridge County

overview.note: "On Tuesday last, being the Court day of this month, on which it was appointed by the last Legislature of this state for holding the election, the principal part of the freeholders, of this county came forward and gave in their votes for a candidate to represent them in the next Congress; on examing the votes, at the close of the polls...The two last representatives from this county to the General Assembly of this state were almost unanimously re-elected." The Virginia Telegraphe, and Rockbridge Courier (Lexington, VA). April 9, 1803.

election_record.reference: The Virginia Telegraphe, and Rockbridge Courier (Lexington, VA). April 9, 1803.
Leonard, Cynthia Miller, ed. The General Assembly of Virginia, July 30, 1619 - January 11, 1978: A Bicentennial Register of Members. Richmond: Virginia State Library, 1978.
